about.title: About the tutor
about.body: I’m Teodoro Morcone, a math tutor in Zurich and founder of Teodoro Morcone Nachhilfe. I specialise in building strong foundations, preparing students for Gymnasium, BMS, HMS, and FMS admissions, and providing continuous support in key secondary math topics. My approach blends step-by-step explanations, progressive practice sets, realistic mock exams, and weekly progress tracking. Lessons are available in German (C1), Italian (C2), and English (C1), delivered exclusively online via Zoom.

items.question: How do reschedules and cancellations work?
items.answer: Sessions can be moved or cancelled free of charge up to 24 hours in advance. Late cancellations are billed as a full session.

items.question: What materials do you use?
items.answer: I combine proprietary practice sets, official exam papers, and customised worksheets. Everything is shared digitally.

items.question: Is tutoring exclusively online?
items.answer: Yes. All lessons run on Zoom with a shared whiteboard, notes, and optional recordings for key solution steps.

items.question: How quickly do you respond to inquiries?
items.answer: Typically within 24 hours with proposed time slots and follow-up questions.

items.question: What are the payment options?
items.answer: Invoice or TWINT within 10 days. Packages are payable in advance.

items.question: How is personal data handled?
items.answer: Data is used solely to organise lessons. Analytics only load after consent, and Zoom recordings happen only with explicit permission.

items.question: Do you cover specific BMS/HMS/FMS components?
items.answer: Yes. I’m familiar with the exam formats and run realistic simulations, including reasoning and writing sections.
